SVGAttributeCrossorigin.summary: This table shows possible keywords and their meaning:

td.para: Client CORS requests for this element will have the credentials flag set to 'same-origin'.
Client CORS requests for this element will have the credentials flag set to 'include'.
Setting the attribute name to an empty value, like crossorigin or crossorigin="", is the same as anonymous.

remarks.para: It follows the same processing rules as the HTML attribute crossorigin.
